name: Plush Puddinu2019 Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E
about: What it is: A lip mask with a plush, pudding-like texture that coats lips with supercharged moisture for a smoother, firmer and plumper-looking pout in 1 week...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, Loss of Firmness and Elasticity..Formulation: Mask..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Coconut and Castor Oils: Bind and retain moisture to promote fuller-, healthier-looking lips..- Pomegranate and Jojoba Oil Complex: Visibly firms and plumps lip and boosts the appearance of bounce and elasticity..- Pomegranate Sterols: Enhance lipsu2019 moisture barrier and boost hydration...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Get instantly hydrated and nourished lips. This mask reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles and improves bounce and elasticity. Lips are left looking fuller, more sculpted and defined. Itu2019s infused with a light scent and flavor...Clinical Results: In a 4-week consumer study on 54 people:.Instantly: Hydrates lips.Over time:.-Smooths and retexturizes lips.-Improves firmness and elasticity.-Improves the look of fine lines and wrinkles.After one week:.-96% agree it hydrates and conditions lips overnight.-94% agree it leaves lips feeling soft in the morning.-93% agree it restores lips overnight...
ingredients: -Coconut and Castor Oils: Rich humectants that bind and retain moisture to promote fuller-, healthier-looking lips..-Pomegranate + Jojoba Oil Complex: Antioxidant-rich; visibly firms and plumps lips and helps with the look of bounce and elasticity..-Pomegranate Sterols: All-natural vegan alternatives to Lanolin; enhance lipsu2019 moisture barrier and boost hydration...Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Polyethylene, Silica, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Malpighia Punicifolia (Acerola) Fruit Extract, Punica Granatum Flower Extract, Punica Granatum Sterols, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Aroma/Flavor, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dicalcium Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Yellow 5 Lake (Ci 19140), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Twist base counter-clockwise to use..-Apply to lips as needed day or/and night...Recycling Instructions:.-The protective outer box is recyclable..-Made from 100 percent PCR (post-consumer recycled) material..-The entire pot is recyclable.

I decided to order the Fenti Lip Mask and pick it up at a Sephora location 7575 Weston Road. Got the email confirmation that it was ready to pick up. Went at the location, picked it up, and noticed the bag was light, but when I looked in the bag, I saw a small box, so I didn't pay it no mind. When I got home to open the product, the box was empty. I immediately called the store to explain the situation. They told me they would check it out and give me back a call but I told the person I was coming back to the store but on my way there I got a call and was told they have one for me when I get there. After receiving the item, I should have opened up the package in the store, but I didn't. When I got home, I didn't open it up until I was ready for bed only to find out it was a use item. I'll never do pick up at that location ever again. Bad customer service!!! I give one star because of the poor service.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this lip mask during the Black Friday sale and itu2019s the best purchase I made all year. I have scarring from years of me chewing my lip as well as my lips splitting in the cold. I originally bought the mask hoping it would just provide moisture, deter me from nervous chewing, and maybe give some protection from the cold. What I got was so much more.   Pros:  - the salted caramel smells good enough to eat.  -I never expected this, but my scarring is going away. I had DARK spots and a little over a month of daily use is fading them. My confidence has been boosted because Iu2019m no longer super self conscious about it.   - the mask is the perfect consistency. Itu2019s not overly gummy or sticky  -LOCKS IN moisture. I live in a colder climate with pretty biting wind. I started wearing the mask when I am outdoors for an extended period of time and it has helped so greatly keeping my lips from drying out.   As far as cons: -the applicator is a little weird at first because it feels awkwardly large to smear on the product but itu2019s not so bad. Youu2019ll get used to it.   -I have to layer a chapstick under my mask. My skin is on the drier side so I have to moisturise first and then lock it in with this mask. Again, not a big deal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My lips have been impossibly dry this season and I use lip balm multiple times a day. Have tried the Laneige lip masks before which didn't wow me. Saw this on sale, liked the ingredients listed, and gave it a try. I'm on my third day of using it (morning and night) and it's definitely giving life back to my lips. My only gripe is the packaging. It took me about 6 twists until product came out and there isn't much control as to how much comes out. I'd barely twist it and sometimes the perfect amount comes out or it continues because of the pressure inside. If it wasn't an extra 20% off I'd be more skeptical. I would only recommend based on the effectiveness, but because of the pump I can't take it with me on the go, I leave it half capped at home as to not waste product.

When it comes to the Plush Puddin' Intensive Recovery Lip Mask With Pomegranate Sterols + Vitamin E, Color (Kalahri Melon) all you need is about a twist and a half or two depending on how much coverage and glossy you want those lips to be ;). I also love the fact that it is long lasting and that you don't need to reapply for about 2hours or so depending on what it is you're doing with your lips to say the least, that is. I will definitely be restoring on this product once it is finished and as I have already recommended via Instagram for my followers to purchase and feel the magic for themselves, I also let those who compliment me in person in on the secret that isn't so much of a secret, ahah ! reviews.review_title: A Must Have for my Makeup Bag and Nightstand!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I never, ever write reviews, but I'd be doing myself a disservice not to in this case.  I CANNOT LIVE WITHOUTH THIS!!  So, I'm that person who has just about everything you can imagine for beauty and skin care.  This is particularly true for lip products.  I'm not exaggerating even a little when I say that I had a flat, dry spot on my bottom lip for years (literally 5+ years).  If I ever made the mistake of peeling off the outer layer of skin there, I often ended up with a cold sore.  It was the worst!!  I have tried everything imaginable.  The old Bite balm in a tube felt good, but I had to keep reapplying, and it didn't get rid of my dry spot.  The Laneige lip sleeping masks (I've got like every flavor).  They feel good, but still didn't touch that spot.  When I found this, I figured it would at least keep my lips moist.  I put it on at night for about 3 days before my husband said (for the first time in 16 years) that my lips were so soft.  Then, before I even realized it was happening, I touched my lip one day and the dry spot was GONE!  That's been a few months ago now, and it's still not come back.  Yes, the mechanism is weird, but I'll use it the rest of my life to keep this balm on my lips!!  I've just ordered the lip oil too bc I want to try an oil and I know Fenty knows how to take care of my lips!  If you're on the fence, it's sooooo worth it!!

First application of the Puddin' and it was like they were fully hydrated. Not only that, they stayed that way. I use it as a night treatment and part of my morning moisturizer routine. I feel like my lips look how they used to when I was younger.

reviews.review_title: Long wear lip mask for overnight
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This mask is so much better than Laneige! Itu2019s much thicker but not sticky at all and actually lasts on my lips overnight. It makes such a difference when I wake up in the morning to hydrated lips. It has a light vanilla scent but itu2019s not overpowering.   I loved the packaging at first as you turn the bottom to get the product out so youu2019re not stuck digging your finger into a container. However my only downside to the packaging is that the quantity you get by turning the bottom is very unpredictable. It clicks when you turn it but itu2019s inconsistent so sometimes youu2019ll get nothing and other times itu2019ll be way too much. Love the product, but the packaging could be improved.

reviews.review_text: The formula is amazing and I really do love the way it dispenses, a little goes a long way. The only reason Iu2019m knocking it down to 4 stars is because of the packaging. It has broken on me twice. Within in the first 2-3 of owning it the screw bottom came off and there was no way to attach it back on. So it doesnu2019t sit flat. Now the product fell off my counter and the bottom fractured off as seen in the picture. I can still use it but I have to wind it myself, which is fine but when youu2019re paying money for what I consider a u201cluxuryu201dproduct, compared to chapstick/Vaseline/ I want that packaging to be sturdy. It didnu2019t fall from a high shelf or at a large force. Just normal every day ware. Thatu2019s a bummer

reviews.review_title: Definitely worth it if you've got dry lips!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this for 3 months now and I absolutely love it. I was using laniege before this and definitely prefer this over that. My lips are VERY dry, and laniege wasn't nearly as helpful as this. I was having to use a lot more product yet it still left my lips feeling dry and rough after I'd taken it off in the morning. The laniege mask had also started leaving a white layer on my lips. This, on the other hand, is amazing. I don't need to use too much and my lips are so soft in the morning, they look nicer in general, and no white layer!

I bought this product on a whim because I really liked the Cherry Treat lip oil, and Iu2019m really glad I did. Itu2019s a bit sticky, but my lips always feel very plump and hydrated when I wake up in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love it. Makes my lip feel plush. I might like the laniege one better just bc of the formula. laniege makes my lips for soft, and is a thinner formula; the fenty one is more thick, dust , hair etc can easily get attached to lips and it feels tacky, but makes my lips amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great day hydration, also works very well as a overnight lip mask. I used this more as a gloss/balm in the daytime--similar to how lots of people wear the Laneige Lip Mask--and it left great shine, lasted a long time on my lips, and left them feeling soft after drydown. The complaints I have with this revolve solely around the packaging. I am aware that this is a lip mask, and having components that require you to dip your finger in them are very common, but it really irritated me having to find somewhere to wipe my finger after use. After you twist the bottom to make the product come out, it would not stop coming out even after I stopped twisting it, which resulted in the top becoming very messy and sometimes the outside becoming sticky.

reviews.review_text: Love this as a great way to end off my skin care routine. It is really thick so a little goes a long way and the container is pretty cool. It's so dry here right now in Canada this has been a life saver.
